Detailed Description

NGS mode and reconstructors in ad hoc split tomography.

Only useful with 1 or 2 DMs.

Field Documentation

double NGSMOD_T::hs

height of LGS

double NGSMOD_T::ht

height of upper DM.

double NGSMOD_T::scale

(1-ht/hs)^-2

double NGSMOD_T::aper_fcp

piston term in focus in plocs.

dmat* NGSMOD_T::MCC

cross coupling of the NGS modes.

2x2 for 1 dm. 5x5 for 2 dms

dmat* NGSMOD_T::MCC_OA

cross coupling of the modes for on axis direction only.

dmat* NGSMOD_T::IMCC_TT

inv of cross coupling of tip/tilt modes only.

dmat* NGSMOD_T::IMCC

inv of MCC.

dcell* NGSMOD_T::GM

ngsmod vector to gradient operator

dcell* NGSMOD_T::Rngs

NGS reconstructor from NGS grad to NGS mod vec.

pinv of GM

dcell* NGSMOD_T::Pngs

Project DM command to NGS modes.

dcell* NGSMOD_T::Mdm

DM vector for the modes.

dcell* NGSMOD_T::Ptt

Invidual DM tip/tilt removal.

spcell* NGSMOD_T::Wa

Aperture weighting.

Ha'*W*Ha. It has zeros in diagonal. Add tikholnov

int NGSMOD_T::nmod

nmod: 5 for 2 dm, 2 for 1 dm.
